Text: I've always wanted to try the Cigars from Cuba

There's a user named Hero on suprbay who seems to share your passion and might possibly be able to help. Looks like Cuba is slowly opening up economically (see this month's Natgeo). So, those cigars should flow freely soon !
I'm pretty sure I could get them here,there is no law in place that prohibits them.In the U.S. they are illegal  but can still be found if you look
